featured.text: The most familiar aspect of Tai Chi Chuan is the hand form, which is a series of slow-flowing movements with poetic names 17 “dragons stirring up the wind” and “wave hands like clouds.”
Some critics worry that online students will miss out on the social aspects of college.
Which of the following aspects about hard hats is NOT discussed in the passage? (A) Their functions.
Dognition’s test measures a dog’s intellect in several aspects—from empathy to memory to reasoning skills.

other.text: In what aspect can smiling help a person in his social life? 4. Give one example of “hard times” mentioned in the passage.

F. Frank Well, if zoos are an inevitability, zoo keepers must provide the best possible conditions for the animals that live in captivity—to say the least! G. George Zoos have an educational aspect to it.

definition.en_def: A particular part or feature of something.
definition.example: One important aspect of the project is its environmental impact.
